articles.author: Charles Gasparino
articles.title: Trump shakes up globalists at Davos summit -- instilling fear and relief while showing Sleepy Joe's no longer at the wheel - New York Post
articles.description: He wasn’t here in person, but The Donald dominated every conversation — and not always in a bad way, even given his America First agenda.
articles.content: DAVOS, SWITZERLAND For the unacquainted, Davos is the home of the World Economic Forum, and hosts a yearly confab of the global elite. The stars are the chiefs of globalist institutions like the IMF;… [+2843 chars]
